title: Banana Peel

fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: The upper text explains the mechanic.

desc:
Post 2394
- __Tag: Mario Kart__: This card cannot be played and has its passives disabled unless if this is the most recent-drawn __Mario Kart__ item card.

- You have 🛡️ equal to the **Echo** value of this card + 1 and they are linked.
 - A Blue Shell (223) meant for you discards this card before it activates onto you.
- Playing this card throws a yellow banana onto the track, causing 3 random 🎨 colors to be trapped. The next player to play a card with any of the 3 colors draws a card, loses 3 💵, and ends the trap. You know what the colors are.
